vulnerabilities.title: Publicly Accessible API Documentation
vulnerabilities.description: API documentation (Swagger) is accessible without authentication
vulnerabilities.impact: Information disclosure - attackers can map entire API surface
vulnerabilities.remediation: Require authentication for API docs or IP whitelist

vulnerabilities.title: Authentication Bypass - /invoices
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement proper authentication checks on all protected routes

vulnerabilities.title: Authentication Bypass - /dashboard
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement proper authentication checks on all protected routes

vulnerabilities.title: Authentication Bypass - /profile
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement proper authentication checks on all protected routes

vulnerabilities.title: Authentication Bypass - /settings
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement proper authentication checks on all protected routes

vulnerabilities.title: Insecure Session Cookie - temp_token
vulnerabilities.description: Session cookie missing security flags: Missing HttpOnly
vulnerabilities.impact: Session hijacking via XSS or MITM attacks
vulnerabilities.proof_of_concept: Cookie: temp_token - HttpOnly: False, Secure: True
vulnerabilities.remediation: Set HttpOnly=True, Secure=True, SameSite=Strict for temp_token

vulnerabilities.title: Session Fixation Vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Session ID does not change after authentication
vulnerabilities.impact: Attackers can hijack sessions using pre-auth session ID
vulnerabilities.proof_of_concept: Login, observe session cookie remains same
vulnerabilities.remediation: Regenerate session ID after successful authentication

vulnerabilities.title: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF)
vulnerabilities.impact: Unauthorized actions performed on behalf of authenticated users
vulnerabilities.proof_of_concept: Create malicious form that submits to target endpoint
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add CSRF tokens to all state-changing forms
